level.heading: Accounts and transfers nontestamentary.
level.text: A transfer resulting from the application of section 19-602.12 is effective by reason of the terms of the account involved and this subchapter and is not testamentary or subject to estate administration.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following ยง 19-601.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 214 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act). See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
